title: Psalms 126:1
text: WHEN the LORD turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.

title: Psalms 126:2
text: Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The LORD hath done great things for them.

title: Psalms 126:3
text: The LORD hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.

title: Psalms 126:4
text: Turn again our captivity, O LORD, as the streams in the south.

title: Psalms 126:5
text: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.

title: Psalms 126:6
text: He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
